word: H2672 - חצב חצב - châtsab châtsêb - khaw-tsab'

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - வெட்டப்படு, சித்திரந்தீர், உண்டுபண்ணு, துண்டி, தச்சராயிரு, வெட்டு, பிள
to dig, to cleave, to divide, to hew, to make, to cut out, to dig out, to cut down, to quarry, a hewer, a mason
b) (Niphal) to be cut, to be hewn, to be engraved
c) (Hiphil) to hew into pieces, to cut up into pieces
d) (Pual) to be cut from, to be hewn from
Cognate: H2672, H4274
